trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> values that can be individually accessed by index.

Except as noted, members of this class behave exactly as described by the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>, and <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> documentation.
trans-unit.target: Se non specificato, i membri di questa classe si comportano esattamente come descritto nella <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>, e <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> documentazione.

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection> class provides several special features: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection> objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **Funzionalità dell'oggetto Freezable:** perché eredita dal <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> (classe), il <xref:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection> classe fornisce diverse funzionalità speciali: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection> oggetti possono essere dichiarati come, condivisi tra più oggetti, in sola lettura per migliorare prestazioni, duplicati e resi thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulle diverse funzionalità fornite da <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> degli oggetti, vedere il [panoramica sugli oggetti Freezable](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

trans-unit.target: Uso della sintassi XAML per gli attributi

trans-unit.target: Valori XAML

trans-unit.source: *oneOrMorePoints*
trans-unit.target: *oneOrMorePoints*

trans-unit.source: One or more <xref:System.Windows.Point> values, with each pair delimited by a single comma and/or one or more spaces.
trans-unit.target: Uno o più <xref:System.Windows.Point> valori, con ogni coppia delimitata da una singola virgola e/o di uno o più spazi.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Point> *[delimeter* <xref:System.Windows.Point> *]\**
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Point> *[il delimitatore* <xref:System.Windows.Point> *]\**

trans-unit.source: *oneOrMorePointObjectElements*
trans-unit.target: *oneOrMorePointObjectElements*

trans-unit.source: One or more <xref:System.Windows.Point> values, declared using object element syntax.
trans-unit.target: Uno o più <xref:System.Windows.Point> valori, dichiarati utilizzando la sintassi degli elementi oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" /> class.
The collection whose items are copied to the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" />.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" /> class that contains items copied from the specified collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> values and has the same initial capacity as the number of items copied.
<paramref name="collection" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> values that the collection is initially capable of storing.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" /> class with the specified capacity.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> to add to the end of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" />.
Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> to the end of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" />.

Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to add a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.
trans-unit.target: A differenza delle tipiche implementazioni di <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, questa implementazione genera un <xref:System.ArgumentException> se si tenta di aggiungere un **null** (**nulla**) riferimento.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" /> is read-only.
\- or -
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" /> has a fixed size.
Removes all items from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" />.
This method does not change the capacity of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non modifica la capacità del <xref:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" /> is read-only.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per produrre copie modificabili di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetti (o qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per produrre copie modificabili di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetti (o qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" />.
Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" /> contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> is found in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the items copied from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" />.
The array must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in <c>array</c> at which copying begins.
Copies the items of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" /> to an array, starting at the specified array index.
<paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
<paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
-or-

The number of items in the source <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" /> is greater than the available space from <paramref name="index" /> to the end of the destination <paramref name="array" />.
Gets the number of items contained in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" />.
The number of items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Numero di elementi presenti nel controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection.Enumerator" /> that can be used to iterate through the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" />.
Determines the index of the specified item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" />.
The index of <paramref name="value" /> if found in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" />; otherwise, -1.
The zero-based index at which <c>value</c> should be inserted.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> to insert into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" />.
Inserts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" /> at the specified index.

Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Insert%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to insert a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.
trans-unit.target: A differenza delle tipiche implementazioni di <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Insert%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, questa implementazione genera un <xref:System.ArgumentException> se si tenta di inserire un **null** (**nulla**) riferimento.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="index" /> is not a valid index in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" /> is read-only.
\- or -
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" /> has a fixed size.
The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> to get or set.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> at the specified index.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Item%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to insert a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.
trans-unit.target: A differenza delle tipiche implementazioni di <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Item%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, questa implementazione genera un <xref:System.ArgumentException> se si tenta di inserire un **null** (**nulla**) riferimento.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="index" /> is not a valid index in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" /> is read-only.
\- or -
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" /> has a fixed size.
The <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of the collection of points.
Converts a <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of a collection of points into an equivalent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" />.
The equivalent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> to remove from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" />.
Removes the first occurrence of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" />.
<see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="value" /> was removed from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" /> is read-only.
\- or -
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" /> has a fixed size.
The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> to remove.
Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> at the specified index.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1.IsReadOnly" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" /> is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" /> è di sola lettura; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" />.
Creates a <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" />.

Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Point.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Point.Y" /> values of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> structures in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" />.
The following code example shows how to create a string representation of <xref:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection>.
